column1: The Purple Pig////Pork blade steak - When they brought this dish out
column2: we were surprised at how big it was. This is probably the best value item on the menu. It looked like a super juicy pork chop served with a caesar style arugula salad. The steak was as good as it gets
column3: hands down my favorite dish of the night. It was super juicy and tender
column4: and something about the flavor just reminded me of breakfast. It had a distinct pepper taste
column5: and almost tasted like breakfast sausage in steak form. Highly recommend this.
